H0.text: Which band have announced they have recorded the official Wales anthem for the upcoming Euro football championship, entitled Together Stronger (C’mon Wales). Feeder

H1.text: Which band have announced they have recorded the official Wales anthem for the upcoming Euro football championship, entitled Together Stronger (C’mon Wales). Lostprophets

H2.text: Which band have announced they have recorded the official Wales anthem for the upcoming Euro football championship, entitled Together Stronger (C’mon Wales). Super Furry Animals

H3.text: Which band have announced they have recorded the official Wales anthem for the upcoming Euro football championship, entitled Together Stronger (C’mon Wales). Manics

A4.text: The band announced in March 2016 that they would be releasing a theme song for the Wales national team ahead of the UEFA Euro 2016 tournament in the summer, entitled 'Together Stronger (C'mon Wales)'
